<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ItemWideVariable">d19ae4bfdba200103f9b47823996193c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:3ea370ffdba200103f9b478239961991</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange boolean</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   this.onChangeBoolean(newValue); 
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-31 13:03:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0dc43cb7dbe200103f9b478239961983</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange boolean</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0dc43cb7dbe200103f9b478239961983</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-31 13:08:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ItemWideVariable">d19ae4bfdba200103f9b47823996193c</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>main</name><order/><script><![CDATA[this.itemVariable = "onLoad value";

function onLoad() {
   updateVariableVisual();
}

this.onChangeUser = function(userName) {
	this.itemVariable = userName;
	updateVariableVisual();
};

this.onChangeBoolean = function(booleanVariable) {
	this.itemVariable = booleanVariable;
	updateVariableVisual();
};

this.updateVariableVisual = function() {
	g_form.setValue('item_wide_variable', this.itemVariable);
};]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-31 13:01:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>09b3b8b7dbe200103f9b478239961946</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>main</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_09b3b8b7dbe200103f9b478239961946</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-31 13:06:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ItemWideVariable">d19ae4bfdba200103f9b47823996193c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d283bcbfdba200103f9b47823996191f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange user</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   g_form.getReference('user', callback); 
}

function callback(user) {
	this.onChangeUser(user.user_name);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-31 13:02:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4cb43cb7dbe200103f9b4782399619a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange user</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4cb43cb7dbe200103f9b4782399619a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-31 13:24:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
